column4: WHY .. OH WHY .. is samba acting so different on 10.04.. sudo service smbd restart says "unrecognized service"
what does the results of this say: ps -e | grep smb
nothing.. although smbd and nmbd does show.
however ps aux -e | grep smb does show the service running.
yes.. using /etc/init.d/smbd restart etc... however when I do that it says that method has been converted to an upstart job.. ie... sudo service smbd restart
yet.. the shares are not accessable from the LAN via a mapped drive in windows running on a vm
all this worked prior to reinstalling 10.04 from 9.10
I think the shares are not accessable because it's not runnign properly, why though is a bit baffeling.
yea.. I was over at #samba and although they suggested a few things basically said it's most likely a distro issue..
I would save my .conf files, then uninstall / reinstall samba then edit your new .conf & restart to see where that puts you.
after having many issues early on with Versin Upgrades, I now only do staright installs.

lol.. that's pretty much what I just did.. reinstalled samba4... then purged it.. installed samba.. however I did't "re-install" samba.. I should try that.... Yea.. I *never* version upgrade any more.. always a fresh install keeping the same /home
I'd un-install, purge, then do a fresh install od Samba and deps, then test again.
Wow... purging samba resulted in an error in the process when trying to stop the process... same error I get when trying to reinstall.. now for an install and see what happens.
if it's running, ya need to kill the PIDS
too late.. already reinstalling.. that'll be the next purge step if I need to..
oif there's previous PIDS or lock files you'll get errors.
sudo service smbd restart now works.. *AND* my windows vm can now see the shares.. YEE HA!  It may not seem like you helped but you did.. Thanks (KD6WQK here)
rrr glad it's working, acutlly Im now KI7MT :-)
time for a nick change? :-))
7 land huh?  Is that AZ?
no, Montana.
7-Lannd is a BIG Place :-)
ah.. I'll be up that way next summer.. family reunion.. but I'm off topic for this channel and have to run anyway..  Will touch base later.
